title: 3 and Out - Super Bowl Week, McDaniel & Pederson HC Hires, Pro Bowl Whining
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Super Bowl Week, McDaniel & Pederson HC Hires, Pro Bowl Whining
description:
John kicks off Super Bowl week by reacting to the Jags hiring Doug Pederson to replace Urban Meyer and the Dolphins hiring Niners OC Mike McDaniel to replace Brian Flores. He also explains why he rolls his eyes at people who complain about the level of play at the Pro Bowl, and how mega coach agents are controlling the NFL search process like they do in college.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
